channel.title: Help
channel.description:
How do i add colors to my server or client, like i know how to put it in, i just dont know how to add the colors to the server like for example when a person yells on my server i want it to look like this
"[Player] Name:Blah blah blah" What would i have to do to get colors added server sided, or client sided..

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

didnt work for my client :s

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

yeah i know how to lay it out, but what im asking is how to install it i guess you would say? because when i put in the color i want it shows the “@red@”

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @getstabbed getstabbed
item.description:
@getstabbed wrote:

Server sided, put @blu@ @red@ @white@ @gre@ @bla@ not sure if there any others. It will be in the file where your commands are, just search for “yell” and then put the tags in front of the [player] etc. Don’t use this code, it’s designed for PI based only.

if (c.playerRights >= 0) { rank = "[Player]["+ c.playerName +"]:"; if (c.playerRights >= 1) { rank = "@gre@[Mod]@bla@["+ c.playerName +"]:"; }

Read full topic
